name: ChibisanjiSNAP
description:
This is an AR Camera app for Android that you can use to pose and take pictures of the chibi 3D models of Selen, Rosemi, Pomu, Finana, and Luca, as seen in NIJISANJI Express.

With this app, you can add one or more models to a virtual scene on top of your real camera and adjust their position, choose between a few animations, as well as add some color and line filters. A smartphone with a gyroscope is required.

The app was developed by @TriaRegulae. The 3D models used were modeled by @Priichu and rigged by @eN7ity.
